title: I want help
body: My pvp there was toxics I've been insulted and one other thing.My electricity went out i didn't intentionally went afk.And i went mid battle my team won and the toxics ganged on me reporting me for afk.My electricity went out and didn't log in time.My team won but that was the third strike of them being rude and we won.They went free to be rude reporting me for afk.I got treated bad in game and went afk.The game was over when i came back.And i got a warning sign from LoL for being afk.The ppl went rude all over me and we won and now the report.I don't want my reports to count.Ive been treated bad in the game and on the report to.Can LoL help to get rid of the reports I've been mistreated to the better end of the game.I don't want my reports to count, I've been mistreated bad and the report too.Ive had my butt kicked in insult and some other thing, and now the report.Was the third of them being free to harass me.What can i do, so LoL doesn't back this up?

replies.body:
Our systems take into account false reports and ensure that they do not count against you.  For example, if you displayed no toxic behavior and did not even use chat, but yet other players reported you for "verbal harassment", these reports would not count as our systems would be able to detect that you did not say such things.  

However, we are all responsible for our own actions.  If you engaged with these players and displayed toxic behavior back to them, this may cause punishments to be added to your account.

I hope this makes things a bit more clear!  Let me know if you have any further questions!
